detail_desc: Short dress in a crêpe weave with a concealed zip at the back, 3/4-length sleeves with inset, hemstitched trims at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Fully lined swimsuit with wide shoulder straps, removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and decorative gathers at the sides.

Chiffon playsuit with a V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and long sleeves with flared flounces at the cuffs.
Trainers in marled cotton with a hook and loop fastener, decorative appliqué at the top and loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short, wide coat in soft faux shearling with notch lapels, buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and large patch pockets. Recycled polyester lining.
Boxy top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with decorative seams. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hoodie in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Canvas slides with a large bow on the front and a braided jute trim around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Tights with an elasticated waist and a reinforced toe section.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a small embroidery detail on the chest.
Soft slippers in patterned imitation suede with elastication around the opening and lacing at the front. Terry linings and insoles and soft, imitation leather soles.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Gently tailored pea coat in sturdy, felted fabric with a high collar, metal buttons at the front, shoulder tabs with metal buttons and welt side pockets. Lined.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing glittery threads with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Shirt in an airy linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Trainers in cotton chambray with concealed elastication at the front, rubber toe caps and a loop at the back. Fabric insoles and rubber soles.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim approx. 6.5 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with narrow piping in a contrasting colour. Relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in soft, fine-knit merino wool with buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trainers in fabric and imitation leather with elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Linings and moulded insoles in mesh, and chunky soles.

Blouse and shorts in a cotton weave. Short-sleeved, crinkled blouse with a decorative frill at the top and buttons at the back. Printed shorts with pleats at the top and elastication at the waist and hems.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave with covered elastication at the waist and a button band with decorative buttons down the front. Gently flared with an overlocked hem. Unlined.
Dress in a soft fine knit containing glittery threads with a round neckline, sewn-on bow at the top and short sleeves.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned fleece that fasten down the front and along one leg. Ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length dress in embroidered, sequined mesh with and opening and button at the back of the neck, short sleeves, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Sewn-in satin underdress.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif at the top and a lined hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, side and back pockets, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Swimming trunks in jersey with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, and a lined front.
Sleeveless dress in soft cotton jersey with a flounced trim over the shoulders and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Two pairs of leggings in different colours of washed stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Stretch outdoor trousers in water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a zip fly, press-stud, and hook and loop fastening. Side pockets, a zipped leg pocket and reinforced hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly.
Twill trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned rubber soles.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside. Front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, button fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
V-neck dress in a viscose weave with an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and high slits in the sides.

Suit trousers in stretch cotton velvet with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in supersoft, stretch denim with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, fly with a press-stud and slim legs.
V-neck T-shirt in airy slub linen jersey.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and a pair of jersey leggings. Top in a slightly longer style with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequin motif on the front and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Large, fabric-covered earrings with a knot detail. Size 7 cm.
Court shoes with pointed toes and block heels. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Short coat in viscose twill with draped lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist and side pockets. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide blouse in a cotton weave with a collar, concealed button placket and detachable tie belt at the waist. Dropped shoulders and wide balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Long-sleeved dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline, an opening and button at the back of the neck and a smocked seam at the waist. Unlined.
Wrapover bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Mesh trainers with a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Jersey linings and insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Short skirt in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, wide pleats at the top, a concealed zip in one side and scalloped hem. Lined.
Short dress in a viscose weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Unlined.
Jacket in washed, stretch denim with a collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Pocket flaps at the front with a button.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a gentle V-neck and cut-out detail at the front. Cups with removable inserts that shape the bust, and covered elastication at the hem. Medium support.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a soft cotton blend with a print motif. Pile-lined hood with a decorative drawstring, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Slightly shorter-style jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a boat neck and long dolman sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short skirt in cotton twill with a high waist, detachable belt, zip fly, side pockets and fake flap back pockets. Unlined.

Top in a cotton weave with a round neckline and small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, a seam at the waist and a wide peplum. Longer at the back.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Strapless maxi dress in jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and slits in the sides. Integral top with elastication at the top.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a raw-edge hem.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Trousers in airy viscose with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Chinos in airy, stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and slim, tapered legs.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length trousers in a soft weave. High paper bag waist with elastication at the back and a sewn-on tie belt at the front, and diagonal side pockets.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable, lace-covered shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
Leggings in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist. Fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap, and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
